Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory282.png'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "So this is how it is. I suppose you don't have a choice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'The way you see it, you might have made the right decision.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson Punishing Virus converges on Luna unceasingly, and her frame begins to glow alight in the same fiery red.'}
{2: 'What are you doing?', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I unlocked the last emergency clearance of the Ascension-Network, allowing me to draw on the power of the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'To attempt this unchecked will damage the M.I.N.D. irrevocably.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Worst case scenario, I will destroy the data of my identity. I will lose myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "...But it's nothing compared to my sister's safety.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Even when I've become... this, Lucia still chooses to trust me and come to my side.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The ivory Ascendant pulls herself up and graciously floats into midair. Above the Red Tide, she seems like an untainted angel.'}

{3: 'But the red crack on Luna also slowly widens. The crumbling white frame breaks like rotten flesh, and the pieces drift away before gathering at her fingertip, turning into a crimson globe of Punishing Virus.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You could've destroyed me with the Energy Core, but you decided to bring me back instead, giving me this chance to save Lucia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'After this, we are even.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This time—it is my turn to protect her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And then Luna raises her hand, calling upon her strength, from her distant past to the uncharted future—'}
{3: 'The earth shakes.'}
